description: Even though he's always Dante Martin's bottom boy, Tanner Hyde wants to show that he can still be in charge. Dante isn't sure where Tanner's tough talk is taking them, but for now he's game. He becomes even more skeptical when Tanner binds him to a chair with tape, but he changes his mind when Tanner shows him what he has in store. Tanner shows Dante all the pleasures of giving up control, and he discovers that it's a role with plenty of unexpected benefits.Enjoy!
title: Bound & Bred
